bug.short_desc: [1.8][compiler] method(java.lang.Class, java.lang.String) not applicable for the arguments (java.lang.Class, java.lang.String)

long_desc.thetext: This and the snippet mentioned in bug 426764 comment 5 are both broken since the fix for bug 426590.

A typo, indeed, in the fix for bug 426590.
Fixed via http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=995521865cfd6e568bdd12bfb7d4a59fc50611ab
